item.title: Breaking: SEC All Set to Approve First Ethereum Futures ETF in US
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
As crypto community awaits a spot Bitcoin ETF, US SEC is all set to approve a Ethereum Futures ETF as reported by Bloomberg. The first Ether Futures ETF is expected to list on Oct. 3rd or Oct. 4th by Valkyrie. Crypto to Have It’s First Ethereum Futures ETF In October In a remarkable update today

item.title: Breaking: SpaceX Unloads $373M Worth of Bitcoin Holdings; BTC Price Dumps
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
Bitcoin’s troubles continue as the popular cryptocurrency dipped below $27,000, raising concerns of a further decline. The latest hit comes in the wake of aerospace giant SpaceX reportedly offloading roughly $373 million worth of Bitcoin, which it had acquired between 2021 and 2022. Amidst this sell-off, Bitcoin faces a resistance of $28,943.90 and new support

The post Breaking: SpaceX Unloads $373M Worth of Bitcoin Holdings; BTC Price Dumps appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Just-In: Coinbase to Halt USDT Trading in Canada Starting August 31st
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
On August 17th, Coinbase announced that it would halt trading of Tether (USDT), Dai (DAI), and RAI stablecoins for Canadian users starting August 31st. This move comes in response to changing regulatory requirements in Canada, where authorities have been tightening their grip on the crypto industry.  Following the path of Crypto.com, which earlier suspended USDT trading after

The post Just-In: Coinbase to Halt USDT Trading in Canada Starting August 31st appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Former FTX Banking Ally Charged by US Federal Reserve

item.description:

item.title: Donald Trump Warns BRICS Expansion As End Of US Dollar
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
As geopolitical tensions rise, former US President Donald Trump sounds the alarm over the greenback’s global position. He pointed to BRICS’s aggressive moves towards de-dollarization as a chief concern. Meanwhile, oil trade dynamics seem to support his views, suggesting a seismic shift in global economic balance. item.title: XRP Price Prediction As Price Loses 10% In A Week, Sell-Off Or Buy The Dip?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
XRP has fallen victim to the crypto market reaction to the release of the previous United States Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) minutes, which hinted at continued monetary tightening. The cross-border money remittance is down 2.5% to $0.58 with its cumulative losses totaling $5.5%. Bitcoin and Ethereum are also in turmoil, down 2.7% to $28,328

item.title: Binance To Delist Litecoin (LTC) And Dogecoin (DOGE) Perpetuals, But There’s A Catch
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Thursday announces a plan to delist Litecoin (LTC) And Dogecoin (DOGE) perpetual contacts next week. The exchange will adjust the leverage and margin tiers of LTCBUSD and DOGEBUSD perpetual contracts today and delist them after an automatic settlement as per the announcement. Binance Delisting Litecoin (LTC) And Dogecoin

item.title: Argentina’s Pro-Bitcoin Candidate Javier Milei Pledges to Shut Central Bank
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
Javier Milei, the leading presidential candidate in Argentina and a strong Bitcoin advocate, has proposed a drastic economic plan to address the nation’s economic issues. As per a Bloomberg report, the radical libertarian has pledged to close the nation’s central bank, dramatically reduce spending, and dollarize the $640 billion economy if he is elected. Sweeping

item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:

item.title: FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX and CEO John J. Ray III agree to settle with Genesis entities for $176 million. FTX creditors are disappointed with the plan and asking the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors of FTX (UCC) to object to the settlement agreement as Alameda paid billions of FTX customer funds to Genesis in 2022.

The post FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX and CEO John J. Ray III agree to settle with Genesis entities for $176 million. FTX creditors are disappointed with the plan and asking the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors of FTX (UCC) to object to the settlement agreement as Alameda paid billions of FTX customer funds to Genesis in 2022.

The post FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Shiba Inu Nosedives 8% After Shibarium Mainnet Launch, Here’s Why
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Shiba Inu is sinking further below $0.00001, contrary to investor expectations of a rally brewing following the launch of the anticipated Ethereum Layer 2 protocol, Shibarium. Down 8%, SHIB is trading at $0.00000908 on Thursday, with the possibility of revisiting lower support levels at $0.0000075 and $0.0000065, respectively.
